messages.content: what's the difference between a passphrase and a recovery phrase?
I am getting weird NFTs in my polygon account

I'm sorry to hear that you're receiving unexpected NFTs in your Polygon account. Please be aware that this could potentially be a scam known as "address poisoning". I strongly recommend you to read this article for more information and guidance: https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/8473509294365-Beware-of-address-poisoning-scams. Stay safe!
